comments.author: Bikemech.7819
comments.body: I would asume it does. But it would be great to check the active events every so and so to see if any of them are active

comments.author: StevenL.3761
comments.body: I could be mistaken, but doesn’t that refer to its chance of spawning? Meaning that the event start time is fixed, but it may or may not start depending on a roll of the dice.

comments.author: Bikemech.7819
comments.body: Most of them are, but supposedly the rare creature spawns are random and that’s whats bugging me :p

comments.author: StevenL.3761
comments.body: Aren’t the dry top events on a fixed schedule though? I saw someone post a time table on reddit a while ago.

comments.author: Bikemech.7819
comments.body:
I was wondering if there are any ways to pull out event data from the the map instance you are in. If there are anything you can pull from memory or something similar. If you can pass the current IP that would be great as well, as I’m open to suggestions.

Was hoping it would be possible to make a small script to see if there are any rare creatures in your current dry top instance.
